author: Sylvie Corbet
title: France urging top powers to endorse UN virus cease-fire call
description: PARIS (AP) — French President Emmanuel Macron says he hopes that "in the coming days" the five permanent members of the U.N. Security Council can discuss and endorse U.N. Secretary-General Antonio...
content: PARIS (AP) French President Emmanuel Macron says he hopes that in the coming days the five permanent members of the U.N. Security Council can discuss and endorse U.N. Secretary-General Antonio Guterres call for a cease-fire to all conflicts in the world in or… [+3494 chars]
